name: The Devils Game
description: This game was made for Mini-Jam 13 - Villains and is as I am new to game development very basic and has art that a child could do better. The aim is to kill the people coming at you before they reach the end of the screen. If even one of them does, you lose. It consists of 5 levels and can be beaten in about a minute but for me was done as a test to see if I could create anything playable in the small time frame as this is my first game jam.
